articles.description: Vinicius Junior scores twice as Real Madrid come away with a draw in the first leg of their Champions League semi-final tie with Bayern Munich.
articles.title: Vinicius' double earns Real draw with Bayern

articles.description: It is 30 years since the death of Ayrton Senna. Sid Watkins, the man who tried to save him, was a close friend who led two safety revolutions within Formula 1.
articles.title: Sid Watkins, Ayrton Senna and Formula 1's safety revolution

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz continues his quest for a third straight title at the Madrid Open with a hard-fought win against Jan-Lennard Struff.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Carlos Alcaraz survives scare to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: Follow live text updates as Coventry City take on Ipswich Town in the EFL Championship.
articles.title: EFL Championship LIVE: Coventry City vs Ipswich Town - score & text updates

articles.description: Leading designer Adrian Newey is negotiating an exit from Red Bull that would leave him free to join another team in early 2025, BBC Sport learns.
articles.title: Adrian Newey: Red Bull designer's lawyers negotiating early exit from team

articles.description: Harry Kane just can't stop scoring - now all he needs is a first career major trophy. Could the Champions League deliver?
articles.title: Bayern Munich 2-2 Real Madrid: Harry Kane 'has blown everyone away' in debut season for Germans

articles.description: Ronnie O’Sullivan cuts a frustrated figure despite coming from 3-1 down to end the opening session of his World Championship quarter-final level at 4-4 with Stuart Bingham.
articles.title: Snooker World Championships: Ronnie O'Sullivan level with Stuart Bingham in quarter-final

articles.description: Madison Keys sets up a semi-final with top seed Iga Swiatek by producing a brilliant comeback against Ons Jabeur at the Madrid Open.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Madison Keys stuns Ons Jabeur as Iga Swiatek reaches semis

articles.description: Negotiations between Bayern Munich and Austria boss Ralf Rangnick are ongoing over him becoming their new manager.
articles.title: Talks ongoing with Rangnick over Bayern Munich job

articles.description: Open Championship 2024: Royal Troon to have longest hole
articles.title: Open Championship 2024: Royal Troon to have longest hole
